purpose: To provide beginners with a structured learning path for developing AI agents through practical lessons
principle: Uses Jupyter Notebooks to deliver interactive lessons and hands-on exercises, leveraging popular AI frameworks and libraries
reusability: Lessons can be reused as educational modules or templates for building custom AI agents; open-source under MIT license
limitations: Primarily targeted at beginners; may not cover advanced AI agent development concepts or use cases
name: ai-agents-for-beginners
description: 11 Lessons to Get Started Building AI Agents
highlight: Comprehensive educational resource with practical lessons for building AI agents
